Name: SOF - Spirits Of Freedom
About the game: Inspired by the MOST ICONIC GAMES IN HISTORY , 'Spirits of Freedom' tells the adventure of a Wolf and a Fox, almost inseparable in a quest, to save their master and their home from the Claws of the Seven Felines. Master 7 Rainbow Spirits, Travel between 2D and 3D worlds. Solve riddles in Explorer Scenarios, BREAK THE SOUND BARRIER with Wolfy and FLY TO THE STARS with Foxy, and above all, have fun with the Game
